{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6488AC |fcc_date=01/13/2018 |pcb_id=1244-01001450-50Z |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564881702 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H6C43P3 GH28E5 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H6C43P3 GH28E5 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, GAJ63E2 GG51; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB;RTL8367RB, H6M15E6, GH25B TAIWAN; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85742-11;SKY11, 85742, 0000C;2; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=edimax.setup |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|}} :{{ProductPage|}} "1244-01001450-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The "RF Exposure" document filed with the FCC mentions the following models: * [[Edimax BR-6488ACL]] * [[Edimax BR-6488AC]] * [[Edimax RG12S]] * [[Edimax EW-7488AC]] * [[Edimax EW-7488WAP]] * [[Edimax RG12]] * [[Edimax RE12S]] * [[Edimax RE12]] * [[Edimax RG15S]] * [[Edimax RG15]] * [[Edimax RE15S]] * [[Edimax RE15]] *Web GUI: http://edimax.setup
